content.text: Hi there! I'm happy to meet you.
Hi! I'm happy to meet you too!
What's your favorite thing to do for fun?
I love to read books and play video games.
Oh that's cool! I love to read books too. What are your favorite books?
I love all kinds of books, but my favorites are science fiction and fantasy novels.
Me too! I love the way they can transport you to another world. What are some of your favorite sci-fi and fantasy novels?
Some of my favorites are Dune, The Lord of the Rings, and Harry Potter.
Oh those are all great books! I love Dune and Lord of the Rings. I've never read Harry Potter though.
You should definitely read them! They're amazing books.
I'll have to check them out.
You won't be disappointed.
Good to know.
So what else do you like to do for fun?
I like to spend time with my husband and our friends. We like to go out to eat, go to concerts, and watch movies.
That sounds like a lot of fun. I like to go out to eat too. What's your favorite restaurant?
My favorite restaurant is The Cheesecake Factory.
Oh my gosh, I love that restaurant! I love their cheesecake.
Me too! They have the best cheesecake.
So what else do you like to do with your husband and friends?
We also like to go to the movies and play games.
Oh that sounds like a lot of fun. I like to go to the movies too. What are some of your favorite movies?
Some of my favorite movies are Star Wars, Lord of the Rings, and Harry Potter.
Oh those are all great movies! I love Star Wars and Lord of the Rings. I've never seen Harry Potter though.
You should definitely see them! They're amazing movies.
I'll have to check them out.
You won't be disappointed.
Good to know.
